short_summary: Hiring for accommodation in Fairbanks, 2 weeks in Feb 2024
description: Seeking a hotel or accommodation provider to provide lodging for the Department of National Defence in Fairbanks, Alaska.
full_summary:
=================
**
**Title:
__________________
W3996-24015S - Accommodation in Fairbanks, Alaska.
_____________________
**
**
**Reference Number:
_____________________
WS4231652989-Doc4274003607
_____________________
**
**
**Publication Notice
_____________________
**
The Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC) [1] announces an open call for bids for a request for proposal (RFP) contract entitled W3996-24015S for accommodation in Fairbanks, Alaska.

**Closing Date:** November 14, 2023, 14:00 EST
**
Quantity and Duration of Services: The contract is for the provision of accommodations at Fairbanks, Alaska, from February 1, 2024, through February 24, 2024, with the hotel(s) located within a 10-mile radius of Fort Wainwright.

**Eligibility:** The contract is open to all qualified suppliers who can meet the objective procurement strategy of s vinc daycare VThree.

**Selection Criteria:** The lowest priced bid will be the winning bid.

**Trade Agreements:** This contract is subject to the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA).

**
**Procurement Category: Subject to Exemption Code SRV
**
**
**Tender Description:**
The Canada is seeking an offeror(s) to provide accommodations to the Department of National Defence (DND) in Fairbanks, Alaska.

**
**Amendment to Closing Time:**
Prospective bidders are advised that the original closing time has been adjusted. Bids must be submitted by November 14, 2023, 14:00 EST to be considered. Any submissions made after this time will not be accepted.

**
**Notice URL:**
https://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/17811285?extsite=MTc4MTEyODVfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

**
**Contact Information:**
For additional information, please contact Martine Hunter (elle-la / she-her) at martine.hunter@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. For quickest response, contact Ariba discovery.

**
**End User:** The Department of National Defence (DND)
